messages.content: okay i'll be at the tents then too! thanks for telling me
Uh I'll be at the tents hopefully Tuesday after 4
You can now call each other and see information like Active Status and when you've read messages.
Thank you and I hope you have a great rest of your day!

next week ill be free on

but my availability is friday anytime before 1 pm

Hi Justin! I am one of the pledges from Alpha Theta pledge class and I was wondering if you would be free for an interview anytime soon? I know you'll be gateway until 2 am but I didn't see that message until now and the buses will stop running soon :(
